translations.chinese: 秦之先，帝顓頊之苗裔孫曰女修。
translations.english: The ancestors of Qin were descendants of Emperor Zhuanxu, a remote grandson named Nüxiu.

context.next: 女修織，玄鳥隕卵，女修吞之，生子大業。

translations.chinese: 女修織，玄鳥隕卵，女修吞之，生子大業。
translations.english: Nüxiu was weaving when a dark bird dropped an egg; Nüxiu swallowed it and gave birth to a son named Daye.

context.previous: 秦之先，帝顓頊之苗裔孫曰女修。
context.next: 大業取少典之子，曰女華。

translations.chinese: 大業取少典之子，曰女華。
translations.english: Daye married the daughter of Shaodian, named Nühua.

context.previous: 女修織，玄鳥隕卵，女修吞之，生子大業。
context.next: 女華生大費，與禹平水土。

translations.chinese: 女華生大費，與禹平水土。
translations.english: Nühua gave birth to Da Fei, who helped Yu control the floods.

context.previous: 大業取少典之子，曰女華。
context.next: 已成，帝錫玄圭。

translations.chinese: 已成，帝錫玄圭。
translations.english: When this was accomplished, the emperor bestowed a black jade tablet.

context.previous: 女華生大費，與禹平水土。
context.next: 禹受曰：「非予能成，亦大費為輔。」

translations.chinese: 禹受曰：「非予能成，亦大費為輔。」
translations.english: Yu accepted it saying: 'It was not my ability alone that accomplished this; Da Fei was my assistant.'

context.previous: 已成，帝錫玄圭。
context.next: 帝舜曰：「咨爾費，贊禹功，其賜爾皁游。

translations.chinese: 帝舜曰：「咨爾費，贊禹功，其賜爾皁游。
translations.english: Emperor Shun said: 'Ah, Fei, you aided Yu's achievements. I grant you a black banner.

context.previous: 禹受曰：「非予能成，亦大費為輔。」
context.next: 爾後嗣將大出。」

translations.chinese: 爾後嗣將大出。」
translations.english: Your descendants will greatly multiply.'

context.previous: 帝舜曰：「咨爾費，贊禹功，其賜爾皁游。
context.next: 乃妻之姚姓之玉女。

translations.chinese: 乃妻之姚姓之玉女。
translations.english: He married him to a jade maiden of the Yao clan.

context.previous: 爾後嗣將大出。」
context.next: 大費拜受，佐舜調馴鳥獸，鳥獸多馴服，是為柏翳。

translations.chinese: 大費拜受，佐舜調馴鳥獸，鳥獸多馴服，是為柏翳。
translations.english: Da Fei bowed and accepted, assisted Shun in taming birds and beasts, and many birds and beasts became tame. This was Bai Yi.

context.previous: 乃妻之姚姓之玉女。
context.next: 舜賜姓嬴氏。

translations.chinese: 舜賜姓嬴氏。
translations.english: Shun granted the surname Ying.

context.previous: 大費拜受，佐舜調馴鳥獸，鳥獸多馴服，是為柏翳。

translations.chinese: 大費生子二人：一曰大廉，實鳥俗氏；
translations.english: Bai Yi's descendants became numerous.

context.next: 二曰若木，實費氏。

translations.chinese: 二曰若木，實費氏。
translations.english: One descendant was Zhongyan, who was in charge of raising horses for the Xia.

context.previous: 大費生子二人：一曰大廉，實鳥俗氏；
context.next: 其玄孫曰費昌，子孫或在中國，或在夷狄。

translations.chinese: 其玄孫曰費昌，子孫或在中國，或在夷狄。
translations.english: During the time of Jie, Zhongyan's descendants split into two branches.

context.previous: 二曰若木，實費氏。
context.next: 費昌當夏桀之時，去夏歸商，為湯御，以敗桀於鳴條。

translations.chinese: 費昌當夏桀之時，去夏歸商，為湯御，以敗桀於鳴條。
translations.english: One branch was the ancestor of Zhao, the other the ancestor of Qin.

context.previous: 其玄孫曰費昌，子孫或在中國，或在夷狄。
context.next: 大廉玄孫曰孟戲、中衍，鳥身人言。

translations.chinese: 大廉玄孫曰孟戲、中衍，鳥身人言。
translations.english: The ancestor of Qin was Feilian.

context.previous: 費昌當夏桀之時，去夏歸商，為湯御，以敗桀於鳴條。
context.next: 帝太戊聞而卜之使御，吉，遂致使御而妻之。

translations.chinese: 帝太戊聞而卜之使御，吉，遂致使御而妻之。
translations.english: Feilian's son was Daluo.

context.previous: 大廉玄孫曰孟戲、中衍，鳥身人言。
context.next: 自太戊以下，中衍之後，遂世有功，以佐殷國，故嬴姓多顯，遂為諸侯。

translations.chinese: 自太戊以下，中衍之後，遂世有功，以佐殷國，故嬴姓多顯，遂為諸侯。
translations.english: Daluo's son was Mengxi.

context.previous: 帝太戊聞而卜之使御，吉，遂致使御而妻之。

translations.chinese: 其玄孫曰中潏，在西戎，保西垂。
translations.english: Mengxi's son was Zhongli.

context.next: 生蜚廉。

translations.chinese: 生蜚廉。
translations.english: Zhongli's son was Yiliao.

context.previous: 其玄孫曰中潏，在西戎，保西垂。
context.next: 蜚廉生惡來。

translations.chinese: 蜚廉生惡來。
translations.english: Yiliao's son was Zhuwei.

context.previous: 生蜚廉。
context.next: 惡來有力，蜚廉善走，父子俱以材力事殷紂。

translations.chinese: 惡來有力，蜚廉善走，父子俱以材力事殷紂。
translations.english: Zhuwei's son was Bo.

context.previous: 蜚廉生惡來。
context.next: 周武王之伐紂，并殺惡來。

translations.chinese: 周武王之伐紂，并殺惡來。
translations.english: Bo's son was Taibo.

context.previous: 惡來有力，蜚廉善走，父子俱以材力事殷紂。
context.next: 是時蜚廉為紂石北方，還，無所報，為壇霍太山而報，得石棺，銘曰「帝令處父不與殷亂，賜爾石棺以華氏」。

translations.chinese: 是時蜚廉為紂石北方，還，無所報，為壇霍太山而報，得石棺，銘曰「帝令處父不與殷亂，賜爾石棺以華氏」。
translations.english: Taibo's son was Guoshi.

context.previous: 周武王之伐紂，并殺惡來。
context.next: 死，遂葬於霍太山。

translations.chinese: 死，遂葬於霍太山。
translations.english: Guoshi's son was Houhu.

context.previous: 是時蜚廉為紂石北方，還，無所報，為壇霍太山而報，得石棺，銘曰「帝令處父不與殷亂，賜爾石棺以華氏」。
context.next: 蜚廉復有子曰季勝。

translations.chinese: 蜚廉復有子曰季勝。
translations.english: Houhu's son was Gongbo.

context.previous: 死，遂葬於霍太山。
context.next: 季勝生孟增。

translations.chinese: 季勝生孟增。
translations.english: Gongbo's son was Chu.

context.previous: 蜚廉復有子曰季勝。
context.next: 孟增幸於周成王，是為宅皋狼。

translations.chinese: 孟增幸於周成王，是為宅皋狼。
translations.english: Chu's son was Shu.

context.previous: 季勝生孟增。
context.next: 皋狼生衡父，衡父生造父。

translations.chinese: 皋狼生衡父，衡父生造父。
translations.english: Shu's son was Yu.

context.previous: 孟增幸於周成王，是為宅皋狼。
context.next: 造父以善御幸於周繆王，得驥、溫驪、驊騮、騄耳之駟，西巡狩，樂而忘歸。

translations.chinese: 造父以善御幸於周繆王，得驥、溫驪、驊騮、騄耳之駟，西巡狩，樂而忘歸。
translations.english: Yu's son was Tai.

context.previous: 皋狼生衡父，衡父生造父。
context.next: 徐偃王作亂，造父為繆王御，長驅歸周，一日千里以救亂。

translations.chinese: 徐偃王作亂，造父為繆王御，長驅歸周，一日千里以救亂。
translations.english: Tai's son was Hou.

context.previous: 造父以善御幸於周繆王，得驥、溫驪、驊騮、騄耳之駟，西巡狩，樂而忘歸。
context.next: 繆王以趙城封造父，造父族由此為趙氏。

translations.chinese: 繆王以趙城封造父，造父族由此為趙氏。
translations.english: Hou's son was Gong.

context.previous: 徐偃王作亂，造父為繆王御，長驅歸周，一日千里以救亂。
context.next: 自蜚廉生季勝已下五世至造父，別居趙。

translations.chinese: 自蜚廉生季勝已下五世至造父，別居趙。
translations.english: Gong's son was Ning.

context.previous: 繆王以趙城封造父，造父族由此為趙氏。
context.next: 趙衰其後也。

translations.chinese: 趙衰其後也。
translations.english: Ning's son was Liang.

context.previous: 自蜚廉生季勝已下五世至造父，別居趙。
context.next: 惡來革者，蜚廉子也，蚤死。

translations.chinese: 惡來革者，蜚廉子也，蚤死。
translations.english: Liang's son was Xi.

context.previous: 趙衰其後也。
context.next: 有子曰女防。

translations.chinese: 有子曰女防。
translations.english: Xi's son was Xu.

context.previous: 惡來革者，蜚廉子也，蚤死。
context.next: 女防生旁皋，旁皋生太幾，太幾生大駱，大駱生非子。

translations.chinese: 女防生旁皋，旁皋生太幾，太幾生大駱，大駱生非子。
translations.english: Xu's son was Xiang.

context.previous: 有子曰女防。
context.next: 以造父之寵，皆蒙趙城，姓趙氏。

translations.chinese: 以造父之寵，皆蒙趙城，姓趙氏。
translations.english: Xiang's son was Ao.

context.previous: 女防生旁皋，旁皋生太幾，太幾生大駱，大駱生非子。

translations.chinese: 非子居犬丘，好馬及畜，善養息之。
translations.english: Ao's son was Shi.

context.next: 犬丘人言之周孝王，孝王召使主馬于汧渭之閒，馬大蕃息。

translations.chinese: 犬丘人言之周孝王，孝王召使主馬于汧渭之閒，馬大蕃息。
translations.english: Shi was the one who assisted the Zhou destroy Yin.

context.previous: 非子居犬丘，好馬及畜，善養息之。
context.next: 孝王欲以為大駱適嗣。

translations.chinese: 孝王欲以為大駱適嗣。
translations.english: King Xiao wished to make him the legitimate heir of Daliang.

context.previous: 犬丘人言之周孝王，孝王召使主馬于汧渭之閒，馬大蕃息。
context.next: 申侯之女為大駱妻，生子成為適。

translations.chinese: 申侯之女為大駱妻，生子成為適。
translations.english: The daughter of Shen Hou became Daliang's wife, and gave birth to a son named Cheng as the legitimate heir.

context.previous: 孝王欲以為大駱適嗣。
context.next: 申侯乃言孝王曰：「昔我先酈山之女，為戎胥軒妻，生中潏，以親故歸周，保西垂，西垂以其故和睦。

translations.chinese: 申侯乃言孝王曰：「昔我先酈山之女，為戎胥軒妻，生中潏，以親故歸周，保西垂，西垂以其故和睦。
translations.english: Shen Hou then spoke to King Xiao saying: 'In ancient times, my ancestor from Li Mountain became the wife of Xuxuan the Rong, and gave birth to Zhongyan. Because of kinship ties, she returned to Zhou and protected the western border. The western border was harmonious because of this.

context.previous: 申侯之女為大駱妻，生子成為適。
context.next: 今我復與大駱妻，生適子成。

translations.chinese: 今我復與大駱妻，生適子成。
translations.english: Now I again married my daughter to Daliang, giving birth to the legitimate son Cheng.

context.previous: 申侯乃言孝王曰：「昔我先酈山之女，為戎胥軒妻，生中潏，以親故歸周，保西垂，西垂以其故和睦。
context.next: 申駱重婚，西戎皆服，所以為王。

translations.chinese: 申駱重婚，西戎皆服，所以為王。
translations.english: Shen and Liang have intermarried twice; the western Rong all submit. This is for the sake of the king.'

context.previous: 今我復與大駱妻，生適子成。
context.next: 王其圖之。」

translations.chinese: 王其圖之。」
translations.english: Please consider this.'

context.previous: 申駱重婚，西戎皆服，所以為王。
context.next: 於是孝王曰：「昔伯翳為舜主畜，畜多息，故有土，賜姓嬴。

translations.chinese: 於是孝王曰：「昔伯翳為舜主畜，畜多息，故有土，賜姓嬴。
translations.english: Therefore King Xiao said: 'In ancient times, Bai Yi raised livestock for Shun; the livestock greatly multiplied, therefore he received land and was granted the surname Ying.

context.previous: 王其圖之。」
context.next: 今其後世亦為朕息馬，朕其分土為附庸。」

translations.chinese: 今其後世亦為朕息馬，朕其分土為附庸。」
translations.english: Now his descendants also breed horses for me; I will divide land as a fief.'

context.previous: 於是孝王曰：「昔伯翳為舜主畜，畜多息，故有土，賜姓嬴。
context.next: 邑之秦，使復續嬴氏祀，號曰秦嬴。

translations.chinese: 邑之秦，使復續嬴氏祀，號曰秦嬴。
translations.english: He enfeoffed them at Qin, to continue the Ying clan sacrifices, titled Qin Ying.

context.previous: 今其後世亦為朕息馬，朕其分土為附庸。」
context.next: 亦不廢申侯之女子為駱適者，以和西戎。

translations.chinese: 亦不廢申侯之女子為駱適者，以和西戎。
translations.english: He also did not reject Shen Hou's daughter as Daliang's legitimate wife, to pacify the western Rong.

context.previous: 邑之秦，使復續嬴氏祀，號曰秦嬴。

translations.chinese: 秦嬴生秦侯。
translations.english: Cheng's son was Duke Zhuang of Qin.

context.next: 秦侯立十年，卒。

translations.chinese: 秦侯立十年，卒。
translations.english: Duke Zhuang's son was Duke Xiang of Qin.

context.previous: 秦嬴生秦侯。
context.next: 生公伯。

translations.chinese: 生公伯。
translations.english: Duke Xiang's son was Duke Wen of Qin.

context.previous: 秦侯立十年，卒。
context.next: 公伯立三年，卒。

translations.chinese: 公伯立三年，卒。
translations.english: Duke Wen's son was Duke Ning of Qin.

context.previous: 生公伯。
context.next: 生秦仲。

translations.chinese: 生秦仲。
translations.english: Duke Ning's son was Duke Wu of Qin.

context.previous: 公伯立三年，卒。

translations.chinese: 秦仲立三年，周厲王無道，諸侯或叛之。
translations.english: Duke Wu's son was Duke De of Qin.

context.next: 西戎反王室，滅犬丘大駱之族。

translations.chinese: 西戎反王室，滅犬丘大駱之族。
translations.english: Duke De's son was Duke Xuan of Qin.

context.previous: 秦仲立三年，周厲王無道，諸侯或叛之。
context.next: 周宣王即位，乃以秦仲為大夫，誅西戎。

translations.chinese: 周宣王即位，乃以秦仲為大夫，誅西戎。
translations.english: Duke Xuan's son was Duke Cheng of Qin.

context.previous: 西戎反王室，滅犬丘大駱之族。
context.next: 西戎殺秦仲。

translations.chinese: 西戎殺秦仲。
translations.english: Duke Cheng's son was Duke Mu of Qin.

context.previous: 周宣王即位，乃以秦仲為大夫，誅西戎。
context.next: 秦仲立二十三年，死於戎。

translations.chinese: 秦仲立二十三年，死於戎。
translations.english: Duke Mu's son was Duke Kang of Qin.

context.previous: 西戎殺秦仲。
context.next: 有子五人，其長者曰莊公。

translations.chinese: 有子五人，其長者曰莊公。
translations.english: Duke Kang's son was Duke Gong of Qin.

context.previous: 秦仲立二十三年，死於戎。
context.next: 周宣王乃召莊公昆弟五人，與兵七千人，使伐西戎，破之。

translations.chinese: 周宣王乃召莊公昆弟五人，與兵七千人，使伐西戎，破之。
translations.english: Duke Gong's son was Duke Huan of Qin.

context.previous: 有子五人，其長者曰莊公。
context.next: 於是復予秦仲後，及其先大駱地犬丘并有之，為西垂大夫。

translations.chinese: 於是復予秦仲後，及其先大駱地犬丘并有之，為西垂大夫。
translations.english: Duke Huan's son was Duke Jing of Qin.

context.previous: 周宣王乃召莊公昆弟五人，與兵七千人，使伐西戎，破之。

translations.chinese: 莊公居其故西犬丘，生子三人，其長男世父。
translations.english: Duke Jing's son was Duke Ai of Qin.

context.next: 世父曰：「戎殺我大父仲，我非殺戎王則不敢入邑。」

translations.chinese: 世父曰：「戎殺我大父仲，我非殺戎王則不敢入邑。」
translations.english: Duke Ai's son was Duke Hui of Qin.

context.previous: 莊公居其故西犬丘，生子三人，其長男世父。
context.next: 遂將擊戎，讓其弟襄公。

translations.chinese: 遂將擊戎，讓其弟襄公。
translations.english: Duke Hui's son was Duke Dao of Qin.

context.previous: 世父曰：「戎殺我大父仲，我非殺戎王則不敢入邑。」
context.next: 襄公為太子。

translations.chinese: 襄公為太子。
translations.english: Duke Dao's son was Duke Ligong of Qin.

context.previous: 遂將擊戎，讓其弟襄公。
context.next: 莊公立四十四年，卒，太子襄公代立。

translations.chinese: 莊公立四十四年，卒，太子襄公代立。
translations.english: Duke Ligong's son was Duke Zao of Qin.

context.previous: 襄公為太子。
context.next: 襄公元年，以女弟繆嬴為豐王妻。

translations.chinese: 襄公元年，以女弟繆嬴為豐王妻。
translations.english: Duke Zao's son was Duke Huai of Qin.

context.previous: 莊公立四十四年，卒，太子襄公代立。
context.next: 襄公二年，戎圍犬丘，（世父）世父擊之，為戎人所虜。

translations.chinese: 襄公二年，戎圍犬丘，（世父）世父擊之，為戎人所虜。
translations.english: Duke Huai's son was Duke Ling of Qin.

context.previous: 襄公元年，以女弟繆嬴為豐王妻。
context.next: 歲餘，復歸世父。

translations.chinese: 歲餘，復歸世父。
translations.english: Duke Ling's son was Duke Jian of Qin.

translations.chinese: 下令國中曰：「昔我繆公自岐雍之閒，修德行武，東平晉亂，以河為界，西霸戎翟，廣地千里，天子致伯，諸侯畢賀，為後世開業，甚光美。
translations.english: Issued command in the state: 'In ancient times, our Duke Mu from between Qi and Yong, cultivated virtue and practiced military affairs, pacified Jin's disorders to the east with the Yellow River as boundary, became hegemon of the western Rong and Di, expanded territory a thousand li, the Son of Heaven granted hegemony, all lords congratulated, opened enterprises for later generations, extremely glorious and beautiful.

context.previous: 孝公於是布惠，振孤寡，招戰士，明功賞。
context.next: 會往者厲、躁、簡公、出子之不寧，國家內憂，未遑外事，三晉攻奪我先君河西地，諸侯卑秦、醜莫大焉。

translations.chinese: 會往者厲、躁、簡公、出子之不寧，國家內憂，未遑外事，三晉攻奪我先君河西地，諸侯卑秦、醜莫大焉。
translations.english: Encountering in the past the unrest of Li, Zhao, Jian, and Chu Zi, the state had internal worries, no leisure for external affairs, the three Jin attacked and seized our former lord's Hexi lands, the lords belittled Qin, no shame greater than this.

context.previous: 下令國中曰：「昔我繆公自岐雍之閒，修德行武，東平晉亂，以河為界，西霸戎翟，廣地千里，天子致伯，諸侯畢賀，為後世開業，甚光美。
context.next: 獻公即位，鎮撫邊境，徙治櫟陽，且欲東伐，復繆公之故地，修繆公之政令。

translations.english: Duke Xian ascended, pacified the borders, moved the capital to Queyang, and wished to attack east, recover Duke Mu's former lands, follow Duke Mu's policies.

context.previous: 會往者厲、躁、簡公、出子之不寧，國家內憂，未遑外事，三晉攻奪我先君河西地，諸侯卑秦、醜莫大焉。
context.next: 寡人思念先君之意，常痛於心。

translations.english: I think of our former lord's intentions, constantly pained in my heart.

context.next: 賓客群臣有能出奇計彊秦者，吾且尊官，與之分土。」

translations.english: Guests and ministers who can put forth extraordinary plans to strengthen Qin, I will honor with office and divide land with them.'
